trans-unit.source: Provides data for mouse related routed events that do not specifically involve mouse buttons or the mouse wheel, for example <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供滑鼠相關路由事件，並不特別涉及滑鼠按鈕或滑鼠滾輪，例如資料<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This event data class is used with the following attached events.
trans-unit.target: 此事件資料類別會搭配下列附加事件。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> This event data class is used with the following routed events.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>這個事件資料類別搭配下列路由事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這些路由的事件轉送，使其更容易存取一般項目模型中先前所列的附加的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而反昇和通道之路由事件的版本也共用事件資料。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: 事件路由傳送，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Other than the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> properties that are relevant for all routed events, the most interesting properties of MouseEventArgs that you might use in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler> implementation are several properties that expose the current button state (such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A>) and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Other than<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>屬性相關的所有路由事件，您可能會在中使用的 MouseEventArgs 最有趣屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>實作數個屬性公開目前按鈕狀態 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A>) 和<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>)。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A> is useful particularly because you can check <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Captured%2A> on it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>很有用，尤其是因為您可以檢查<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Captured%2A>一致的情形。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Captured%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that events that specifically deal with mouse button events use a different event data class, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，專門處理滑鼠按鈕事件的事件會使用不同的事件資料類別， <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The mouse button properties are available on MouseEventArgs in case there are input modes or interactions that involve the buttons even if you are handling a non-button event.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠按鈕內容上可用 MouseEventArgs 以防有輸入的模式] 或 [涉及按鈕，即使您正在處理非按鈕事件的互動。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來判斷滑鼠的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"></xref> and timestamp
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"></xref>類別使用指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"></xref>和時間戳記

trans-unit.source: The mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件相關聯的滑鼠裝置。

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: 輸入發生的時間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"></xref>, timestamp, and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"></xref>類別使用指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"> </xref>，時間戳記和<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件相關聯的滑鼠裝置。

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: 輸入發生的時間。

trans-unit.source: The logical stylus device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯手寫筆裝置與此事件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the mouse pointer relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回滑鼠指標相對於指定項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: The point (0,0) is the upper-left corner of the frame of reference.
trans-unit.target: 點 (0，0) 是參考框架的左上角。

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GetPosition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method can also be used to obtain the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 靜態<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GetPosition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法也可用來取得的滑鼠位置。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GetPosition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The element to use as the frame of reference for calculating the position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 要當成參考框架計算滑鼠指標位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-coordinates of the mouse pointer position relative to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標位置，相對於指定物件 x 和 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 特定類型的方式，可以增加事件系統的效率，叫用事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將泛型處理常式轉換為<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>然後再叫用它。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需這項實作模式及它的理由的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>和[路由傳送事件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: 若要以特定類型的方式呼叫泛型處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: 要呼叫的處理常式上的目標。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the left mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 取得滑鼠左鍵的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來判斷滑鼠的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the left mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 左邊的滑鼠按鈕時，可能是目前狀態<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the middle mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 取得滑鼠中間鍵的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來判斷滑鼠的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the middle mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠中間鍵，可能是目前的狀態<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此事件相關聯的滑鼠裝置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來判斷滑鼠的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件相關聯的滑鼠裝置。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the right mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的滑鼠按鈕狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來判斷滑鼠的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the right mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 右邊的滑鼠按鈕時，可能是目前狀態<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the stylus device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此事件相關聯的手寫筆裝置。

trans-unit.source: The stylus associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆，與此事件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the first extended mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 取得第一個延伸的滑鼠按鍵的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來判斷滑鼠的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the first extended mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可能是第一個延伸的滑鼠按鍵的目前狀態<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the second extended mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 取得第二個延伸的滑鼠按鍵的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來判斷滑鼠的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the second extended mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可能是第二個延伸的滑鼠按鍵的目前狀態<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有預設值。
